Excited to announce that my bill, the Public Service Spending Integrity Act, was passed as an amendment and will be included in the final bill! My bill will prohibit government funds from going toward a business controlled by any President, Vice-President, or cabinet member.
Tomorrow, the House is voting on the #ForThePeople Act: a bill that keeps our promise to help clean up corruption, reign in special interests, and protect every American’s fundamental right to vote.
